name: Bug Attack (itch) (DoubleDevTeam)
description:
Bug Attack Is The Project Create For Github Game Jam

Controller : 

Left Click - Attack

E - To Skill, To Hack

W,A,S,D - Moving The Character

Space - To Fly At The Desk To PC

Gameplay Description : Avoid The Hand Thats Can Make Your Dead And Find The Enter To The Pc Part , After Enter The Pc Part Destory The Pc Part With Time Limit
